Some examples of tutorials created using the **learnr** package are shown below (click the example to try it out). You can find the source code for these and other examples here:  https://github.com/rstudio/learnr/tree/main/inst/tutorials/.

```{r echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
ex <- yaml::read_yaml("examples.yml")
res <- lapply(ex, function(x) {
  if (!grepl("^https?://", x$img)) x$img
})
res <- res[vapply(res, Negate(is.null), logical(1))]
if (length(res)) {
  cat(
    "\n---\n", 
    yaml::as.yaml(list(resource_files = res)),
    "\n---",
    sep = ""
  )
}
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
quillt::examples("examples.yml")
```
